main.title: Resume Project
main.name: Shreyas Jaiswal
main.description: I am a web developer and I use MERN tool to develop web applications. This project shows my other projects and skills, and can be considered as my resume
main.bio: After completing my schooling in 2019 I went to Delhi Uni. for my UG. There I developed intrest in WebDev, leter diving deep into it, I reaslized MERN stack is more flexible than PHP so I choose that as my tools. Now coming to what I know/can do using MERN as tool : REST APIs, TDO Approach of coding, Integrating frontEnd to backEnd, adding security to the database and more. Although I am a full stack I like to design backend part more than frontend. I also like to read in my Freiziet, and go for swimming occasionally.
main.contactmessage: In case my skills and knowledge can be of any help to you, then feel free to drop a message
